title: Drawing, "Hercules adds Bow and Arrow to Philactetes", 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, over traces of black chalk on light blue laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: ercole prima di morire dona a' filottete i dardi e l'arco
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Hercules lies at left. Philactetes receives arrows; he holds bow in left hand. Funeral pile is in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hercules adds Bow and Arrow to Philactetes", 1813.
1813. Pen and brown ink, over traces of black chalk on light blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3234.
